title: Understanding Hereditary Patterns
text: Some mental illnesses have been observed to run in families, suggesting a genetic component. This means that if a family member has a certain mental illness, other family members might be at a higher risk of developing the same condition.

title: Genetic Factors in Mental Health
text: Research has shown that genetics can play a significant role in the development of mental illnesses. This doesn't mean that mental illnesses are entirely hereditary, but there is often a genetic predisposition.
